mapper.select: SELECT EBOARD_NO, GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO !=301 AND CGORY_NO !=102 AND EBOARD_DELFLAG ='N' ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC
SELECT EBOARD_NO , GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO = #{cgory_no} AND EBOARD_DELFLAG ='N' ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUM, EBOARD_NO, GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC) ROW_NUM, EBOARD_NO, GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO = 102 AND EBOARD_DELFLAG ='N') WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT EBOARD_NO, GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO = 102 AND EBOARD_DELFLAG ='N' ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC

SELECT EBOARD_NO , GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID ,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_CONTENT,EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE, EBOARD_DELFLAG, CALD_START, CALD_END FROM ENTRBOARD e LEFT JOIN CALENDAR c ON e.CALD_ID = c.CALD_ID WHERE EBOARD_NO = #{eboard_no}
SELECT EBOARD_NO , GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID ,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE, EBOARD_DELFLAG FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO !=301 ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC
SELECT EBOARD_NO , GUBUN_NO, CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO = #{cgory_no}
